name: Maneena in a kind Adventure -demo
description:
We are excited to introduce Maneena in a kind adventure, a video game stuctured in Unreal Engine, with much multitasking adventure and interesting  encyclopedical knowledge.

This demo contains parts of 3 game levels, each one finishing with a big question mark. In the first level you will finally meet and play with Manenna, in the second you will shoot down walls, but you will have to find the solution of how to break the dead ends, and finally in the third level you will drive a vehicle and climb a mountain!

You can support the game or even become a Game actor:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/virtualtechnologies/maneena-in-a-kind-adventure
